abstract: petrobras will boost investment plan to $ 74.5 billion .
article: afp/file / yasuyoshi chiba petrobras says $ 60.3 billion of its four-year investment budget will go toward exploration and productionbrazil 's state oil company petrobras on thursday announced it will slightly boost its four-year investment plan to $ 74.5 billion between 2018 and 2022 . the company , which has been hit hard by a corruption scandal and falling crude oil prices , said investment would rise a notch from the $ 74.1 billion forecast last year for investment between 2017-2021 . petrobras said in a statement that $ 60.3 billion of this sum would go toward exploration and production .

refining and transportation of natural gas will account for $ 13.1 billion of investments . the company , which has embarked on a series of major auctions of deep-water oil fields in the atlantic , said total production of gas and oil should rise from 2.7 million barrels per day in 2018 to 3.5 million bpd in 2022 . brent crude prices are expected to rise from $ 53 per barrel next year to $ 73 in 2022 , petrobras said .
